books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A classic novel depicting the roaring twenties in America.

books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful portrayal of racial injustice in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring the dangers of totalitarianism.

books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A classic coming-of-age novel capturing the angst of adolescence.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, introducing the magical world of Hogwarts.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A classic fantasy novel, the precursor to The Lord of the Rings trilogy.

books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A timeless romantic novel exploring themes of love and societal expectations.

books.name: The Martian
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A science fiction novel about an astronaut stranded on Mars and his struggle for survival.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about a young shepherd's journey to discover his personal legend.

books.name: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: An epic novel exploring the obsession of Captain Ahab with the white whale, Moby-Dick.

books.name: The Odyssey
books.author: Homer
books.description: An ancient Greek epic poem telling the story of Odysseus's adventures and journey home.

books.name: The Shining
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A horror novel about a family's winter stay at an isolated hotel with a haunted past.

books.name: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring a future society where technology controls every aspect of life.

books.name: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: A Gothic novel about the consequences of scientific experimentation and the nature of humanity.

books.name: Dracula
books.author: Bram Stoker
books.description: A classic horror novel telling the story of Count Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England in order to spread the undead curse.

books.name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.description: A philosophical novel about the consequences of aestheticism and the pursuit of pleasure without consequences.

books.name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
books.author: Lewis Carroll
books.description: A whimsical tale of a young girl's adventures in a fantastical world.

books.name: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic fantasy trilogy following the journey to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron.

books.name: The Brothers Karamazov
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A philosophical novel exploring themes of morality, faith, and the nature of existence.

books.name: The Count of Monte Cristo
books.author: Alexandre Dumas
books.description: An adventure novel about a young sailor wrongfully imprisoned, who escapes and seeks revenge.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: A Study in Scarlet
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: The first Sherlock Holmes novel, introducing the detective and his companion Dr. John Watson.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Hound of the Baskervilles
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: One of the most famous Sherlock Holmes novels, involving a legendary demonic hound.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: A collection of short stories featuring the brilliant detective Sherlock Holmes.

books.name: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A self-help book focusing on the science of habits and how tiny changes can lead to remarkable results.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Sign of the Four
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Another intriguing case for the detective Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John Watson.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Sherlock Holmes recounts some of his most fascinating cases in this collection of stories.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Sherlock Holmes returns in this collection of stories, solving more mysterious cases.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: His Last Bow
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: The final collection of Sherlock Holmes stories, featuring his last adventures.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Valley of Fear
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a mysterious murder with roots in a secret society.

books.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Another collection of intriguing cases solved by the brilliant detective Sherlock Holmes.
